StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_OPSShipperWrapDischarged]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@ssn varchar(9), @discharge_code varchar(4), @discharge_date date.me
as
declare @marine_candidate_id int, @nwa_id int, @contract_id int, @ship_id int, @ship_date date.me, @disposi.on varchar(20), @prior_discharge_date date.me
--- Validate the SSN if not exists(select 1 from person where social_security_number = @ssn)
BEGIN Print 'The Social Security Number you have entered is not valid in MCRISS' RETURN END
--- Set the Marine Candidate ID set @marine_candidate_id = (select person_id from person where social_security_number = @ssn)
--- Set the NWA ID set @nwa_id = (select max(nwa_id) from nwa where marine_candidate_id = @marine_candidate_id)
--- Validate NWA record if @nwa_id is NULL
BEGIN Print 'There is no NWA record in MCRISS associated with this applicant' RETURN END
--- Set the Contract ID set @contract_id = (select contract_id from contract where nwa_id = @nwa_id)
--- Validate the Contract record if @contract_id is NULL
BEGIN Print 'There is no Contract record in MCRISS associated with this applicant' RETURN END
--- Set the Ship ID set @ship_id = (select ship_id from shipper where contract_id = @contract_id)
--- Validate the Shipper record if @ship_id is NULL
BEGIN Print 'There is no Shipper record in MCRISS associated with this applicant' RETURN END
--- Set exis.ng Disposi.on Code set @disposi.on = (select max(disposi.on_code) from candidate_status where nwa_id = @nwa_id)
--- Determine if applicant is a Shipper Recruit if @disposi.on != 'N'
BEGIN Print 'This applicant is not a Shipper Recruit' RETURN END
--- Determine if there is an exis.ng Discharge Date set @prior_discharge_date = (select drop_date from recruit_training where ship_id = @ship_id)
if @prior_discharge_date is not null
BEGIN Print 'There is an exis.ng Discharge Date for this Shipper' RETURN END
--- Validate the Discharge Code if not exists(select 1 from discharge_reason where discharge_code = @discharge_code)
BEGIN Print 'The Discharge Code you entered is not a valid code in MCRISS' RETURN END
--- Set the Ship Date set @ship_date = (select ship_date from shipper where ship_id = @ship_id)
--- Update Candidate Status INSERT candidate_status (nwa_id, status_e.ec.ve_date, status_type, status_code, disposi.on_code, user_login, update_date) VALUES (@nwa_id, @discharge_date, 'E', 'C', 'O', 'OpsSta.', getdate())
--- Add record to Recruit Training INSERT recruit_training (ship_id, ship_date, drop_reason, drop_date, user_login, update_date) VALUES (@ship_id, @ship_date, @discharge_code, @discharge_date, 'OpsSta.', getdate())
